name: ERPNext
description: Open source ERP system for financial accounting, inventory management etc.

SDGs.evidenceText: ERPNext provides a high quality and low cost software solution that encourages the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises through access to essential resource management services and tools. This aligns with target 8.2: Diversify, innovate and upgrade for economic productivity, where we support technological upgrading and digitalization in diverse sectors for economic growth.
